reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my wife booked the Alicia,following previous reviews on this site,and we were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Went on strength of reviews.

reviews.text: Hotel food good quality and varied.
reviews.title: great pool

reviews.text: Hotel staff friendly and multi lingual.
reviews.title: moaning oldies

likes.disliked: — elderly people moaning about children enjoying then selves

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel cleanliness spot on.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel
wonderful hotel
reviews.text: Hotel room superb (ask for a sea view).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is excellent,clean good food and very helpful reception but if you have one of the 27 pool view rooms you will be kept awake until after midnight most nights by the Casa Roman bar 100 meters away. They have very loud live music.Trying to change rooms is a marathon. The rep was no help and after six nights we spoke to the manager who explained the rooms were allocated by Portland and he could not change them. He contacted Portland,got authorisation to move us to a sea view room but we had to pay £87.I now find that the extra charge for a sea view is £28 for two for two weeks
reviews.title: great hotel shame about the noise

reviews.text: The hotel price is the same for all rooms.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel but...

reviews.text: This problem ruined what could have been a very pleasant holiday in a great hotel
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday - 100%

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jan
reviews.title: Lovely value for money hotel

reviews.text: My sister and I have just returned from a week at the Hotel Alicia in Cala Bona Majorca. This is our third visit to this hotel, the last time was 2005. The hotel is spotlessly clean and the staff work hard to keep it that way. The reception staff were so helpful and pleasant considering some of the people they had to deal with. Indoor pool is lovely and worth a visit. The terrace is a real suntrap, they have plenty of umberellas up there too.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel - Fantastic location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a beautiful hotel one of the best hotels we have stayed in.. We had a lovely room facing the sea. Plenty of sunbeds and we never had a problem getting a sun bed which sometimes you find difficult in other hotels. The food was fine and the staff were very pleasant and helpful. Would definitely stay in this hotel again.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: will certainly return in the very near future.meals were varied, although they could have been a little warmer at times and the carving of the meat in the evening lacked a little expertise and finnesse. all in all, a great place to stay.
reviews.title: best hotel we've stayed at for many years.no complaints at all .big rooms,very clean and well maintained.

reviews.text: I went to the Alicia with two of my sisters,we had three single rooms overlooking the pool and gardens.Rooms were spotlessly clean,plenty of storage space,bright and cheerful-also carpeted,which means no 'carthorse' noises from people above clomping about when they return later than you at night! Without exception,all the staff were friendly,efficient,and seemed genuinely to enjoy their jobs. All our meals were delicious,the food is well presented,good variety and appetising.The hotel is very well situated,near to bus stop,shops and cafe/bars etc. Gardens,pool etc. again kept clean and tidy. The only things to my mind stopping this hotel warranting 4star status,are there is no fridge in the rooms,or tea/coffee making facilities,but I could thoroughly recommend this place to anyone,particularly as Cala Bona is such a pleasant,quietish resort,although not to any party animals perhaps!
reviews.title: brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: sorry to say this but we did not like the beach,its man made,the sand hurts your feet take some water sandels. the hotel is ok food ok,but could not stand all the bikes and trikes going up and down all day and night ,very noisey,go to sa coma far better beach.the buses run frequently,callor millor very busy beach to meny bodies,I sound a moaner i know ,but we were dissapointed but not everyone is the same,some might realy enjoy it ,If i ever go back it will be to menorca ,we like it quiet.on a lighter note the food and the people are lovely.the habour is very pretty walk further down the road you will find quiet bays
reviews.title: did not like the resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed here two years ago for our honeymoon and loved it. food was good, staff nice, hotel spotless, downside, the entertainment was a big patchy, other than that wonderful..
reviews.title: perfect honeymoon

likes.liked: — beautiful room with breath taking sea view

reviews.text: We had a fantastic holiday at the Hotle Alicia so good i have just booked to go back next year.
reviews.title: Fantastic

likes.disliked: — some older travellers moaning about my child playing in the pool !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely room overlooking the sea, very clean, very friendly, food great even though my son is a vegatarian, lots of choice and friendly staff both in dining area and bar.
reviews.title: Great holiday

reviews.text: While we were there a few people did complain but I think you will get that anywhere you go for us it was a fantastic hotel and would recomend to anyone.
reviews.title: average

reviews.text: 31st August 2008. My partner and I have just returned from a week's holiday at the Hotel Alicia and are very pleased we chose this hotel and resort.
reviews.title: Fantastic location but...........
A great holiday
reviews.text: I agree with previous reviews that the whole hotel is very clean, the staff are friendly and what a fabulous view from our seaview room.
